channel.title: Bibliography on Diogenet
channel.description: Recent content in Bibliography on Diogenet

item.title: Critical Editions
item.description: Diogenes, Laertius. 2000. Vitarum Philosophorum Libri, Vol. I: Libri I-X. Edited by M. Marcovich. Berolini: K.G. SAUR VERLAG. ———. 2013. Lives of Eminent Philosophers. Edited by Tiziano Dorandi. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.

item.title: Translations
item.description: Diogenes, Laertius. 1925. Lives of Eminent Philosophers. Translated by Robert Drew Hicks. The Loeb Classical Library 184-185. London : New York: W. Heinemann; G.P. Putnam’s Sons. ———. 2018. Lives of the Eminent Philosophers. Translated by Pamela Mensch and James Miller.
